summary: Harvey, a neurotic private investigator and wannabe crime writer, gets asked to marry his best friend's mistress.
cast: Hugo Weaving|David Wenham|Rebecca Frith|Sacha Horler|Helen Dallimore|Natalia Novikova|Alan Lovell|Felicity Price|Laurie Foell|Todd William Worden|Brigid Dixon|Peter Beaumont|Peter Astridge|Alexandre Zilberman|Mark Zitserman|Arkadi Uchitel|Alisa Katan|Isabella Katan
title: Russian Doll
